def.dt: :the way in which something is placed in relation to its surroundings
:position with respect to conditions and circumstances
:relative position or combination of circumstances at a certain moment
:a critical, trying, or unusual state of affairs :problem
:a particular or striking complex of affairs at a stage in the action of a narrative or drama
:a radio or television comedy series that involves a continuing cast of characters in a succession of episodes
:a system of ethics by which acts are judged within their contexts instead of by categorical principles called also situational ethics
